headline: GOP candidate releases ad showing a faux shootout with husband of Gabby Giffords, the Arizona lawmaker who was shot in the head in 2011
author: Sinéad Baker
sentences: An Arizona Republican Senate candidate released an ad that showed him in a mock shootout with an actor playing the husband of Gabby Giffords, a former Arizona lawmaker who was shot in the head while she was with constituents in 2011.

Jim Lamon is running against Giffords' husband, Mark Kelly, and on Thursday released the ad which shows him in a mock Wild-West town, with actors playing the roles of Kelly, President Joe Biden, and House Speaker Nancy Pelosi.

Watch the video here:
—Jim Lamon (@jim_lamon) February 10, 2022
Giffords, Kelly's wife, was shot in the head at point-blank range when she was meeting constituents outside a Safeway grocery store.
The three actors walk into the town in a scene reminiscent of traditional Western movies, with the fake Biden carrying a rifle, the fake Pelosi a knife, and the fake Kelly a revolver.
